EmailTemplate.name: LE-202211-HP-TAR-HEV-Blues-Peer-Insights.post-event
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending Blues Peers Insights 2022
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for attending During Blues Peers Insights, we brought together your Blues peers to network, innovate and collaborate on how to improve care coordination and virtual care strategies for your clients and members. We hope you enjoyed the time as much as we did, and if you have any questions please don’t hesitate to contact your Teladoc Health representative. If you didn’t have a moment during the event, we encourage you to take our survey <[[https://forms.office.com/r/WudstbGt3k]]>. About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
